Text:
put wrong description and category, here the good one

http://www.btarena.org/console/ps3/mortal-kombat-ps3-charged

Genre: Fighting
rls date: 2011-04-15
Region source: USA

Prepare yourself to reenter the tournament in the triumphant return of Mortal Kombat. A complete reboot of the franchise, this latest iteration combines all-new mature oriented fighter gameplay with a deep story mode, improved graphics and game technology and new game modes to create a Mortal Kombat play experience like none before it. Feature details include: a storyline that takes players back to the original tournament, 4 player tag-team kombat, 3D TV compatibility, fatalities presented in graphic detail never imagined in earlier releases, enhanced online functionality and more.

@Zagraab If your loader can fix it, then you won't need it. Many people (like me) are still using Gaia which is very simple and doesn't modify PARAM.SFO.

If you run on a 3.55 CFW, you don't need a "fixed" EBOOT... the original works. Also, make sure you got "UP1018-BLUS30522_00-MORTALKOMBATPTCH-A0101-V0101-PE.pkg" installed.

Mortal kombat 9 please!!! pc

Thank's, it's work fine (3.55 rebug + multiman 04.00.00 full). For everybody who didn't get how to work, pay attention:
External HD:
1-Copy the game to "GAME" folder.
2-Install the patch
3-Enjoy =D
Internal HD
1-Copy the game to your internal HD with multiman or awesome files manager
2-Rename the game from "BLUS-30522" to "BLUS30522"
3-Enjoy

P.S. DO NOT SAY WHAT U DON'T KNOW, ASK FIRST. IT'S WORKING 100%. Any doubt, just let me know
I forgot, on internal HD, after rename, you must to install the patch.
